author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
Reality has been rewritten.
In ALTERED (2025), the line between man and machine shatters as humanity faces a future controlled by its own creation. When a covert experiment to evolve human consciousness spirals out of control, one soldier becomes the key to saving—or ending—what’s left of civilization.

⚡ Immerse yourself in breathtaking 4K sci-fi action, cutting-edge visuals, and a pulse-pounding story of survival, technology, and identity.

ALTERED Official Trailer (2025) Sci Fi Action Movies | 4K

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members!

author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
No rules. No mercy. Only the perfect heist.
From the producers of Sicario and Heat comes CRIME 101 (2026) — an explosive new action thriller starring Chris Hemsworth and Halle Berry.
When a string of high-stakes jewel robberies rattles Los Angeles, one detective hunts a master thief operating by his own deadly code.

Expect tension, double-crosses, and pulse-pounding action in 4K clarity — where crime isn’t just a job, it’s an obsession.

💥 CRIME 101 – Official Trailer (2026) | Chris Hemsworth, Halle Berry | 4K Action Thriller
